WELCOME.title: Welcome to QLC Chain Multidimensional Block Lattice!
WELCOME.text_start: To get started, choose an option below to configure your wallet
WELCOME.text_already_exsist: It looks like your wallet is already configured.

TRANSACTION_DETAILS.transaction_error: Unable to load the transaction, double check that the hash is correct and try again!

RECEIVE.receive_text:
When someone sends you QLC token, you are also in charge of performing a receive block to actually receive the funds.
If you have the wallet open when you receive a transaction, this will be performed automatically.
Otherwise, select the account you are expecting to receive from below to search for pending transactions.

ADDRESS_BOOK.name: Name
ADDRESS_BOOK.info: Use the address book to store a label for your own accounts and others you frequently transact with, which are visible throughout the application.
ADDRESS_BOOK.name_placeholder: Examples: Exchange Deposit Address, Marin Trading Account, Friend’s Name, etc

REPRESENTATIVES.representatives_text: You have delegated voting weight to the following representatives
REPRESENTATIVES.status_alert: This is an official representative or it has very high (10%+) voting weight.  It is recommended to change to a new representative!
REPRESENTATIVES.status_warn: This representative has a high voting weight (1%+).  Consider changing to a new representative.
REPRESENTATIVES.status_trusted: This representative is marked as trusted.  No change is needed.
REPRESENTATIVES.status_known: This representative is saved in your list, as long as it is online, no change is needed.
REPRESENTATIVES.status_none: This representative is not known, consider switching to a known one or add this one to your list
REPRESENTATIVES.select_accounts: Select the accounts which are using this representative
REPRESENTATIVES.no_voting_delegate: None of your accounts have delegated any voting weight yet, you must receive a transaction to change your representative!
REPRESENTATIVES.select_all_acc_with_rep: Click on a representative to select all of the accounts delegated to it

REPRESENTATIVES_LIST.representatives_list_text: You can use the representatives list to store a label and other information for representatives you use.
REPRESENTATIVES_LIST.name: Name
REPRESENTATIVES_LIST.no_reps1: You do not have any representatives saved yet,
REPRESENTATIVES_LIST.trusted_check_tooltip: Make a representative appear at the top of your list as a recommended option
REPRESENTATIVES_LIST.avoid_check_tooltip: Warn the user when using this representative

IMPORT_WALLET.error: There was an issue reading the import data for your wallet.  Double check the address and try again.
IMPORT_WALLET.import: Almost finished - just enter your wallet password to decrypt your wallet!
IMPORT_WALLET.imported: Your wallet has been successfully imported!

IMPORT.import_text: If you already have a QLC Chain Wallet, you can import it below. When you import a wallet, none of your existing wallets or accounts are affected, and your seed is not stored anywhere besides in your local client. Use the drop down below to select which type of import you want to use.
IMPORT.seed_placeholder: Enter any QLC Chain Wallet’s 64 character seed
IMPORT.file_text: If you have saved your wallet to a file, use the button below to import it.
IMPORT.ledger_install: Make sure you have the QLC app installed, then connect your ledger device via USB (Chrome/Opera only).
IMPORT.ledger_not_connected_desc: Connect your ledger device via USB and make sure you have the Nano app installed, then press the button below to retry
IMPORT.ledger_locked_desc: Unlock your Ledger device, then press the button below to retry
IMPORT.ledger_ready_desc: Press the import button below to use your ledger wallet

CONFIGURE_WALLET.configure_wallet_warning:
You already have a wallet configured
Before going any further, be 100% certain you have backed up the seed to your current wallet!
Without it, any funds you have will become completely unrecoverable!
CONFIGURE_WALLET.configure_wallet_text: Choose an option below to configure your wallet

CREATE_NEW_WALLET.create_new_wallet_text1:
When you create a new wallet, a new QLC Wallet seed will be generated which can be used to create brand new accounts on the QLC Chain network.
Your QLC Wallet seed is the master key to all of your accounts and any money inside of them!
CREATE_NEW_WALLET.create_new_wallet_text2: Make sure you back up your seed, write it down, and keep it incredibly safe!
CREATE_NEW_WALLET.create_new_wallet_text3: There is NO way to recover it after creation, and all funds inside WILL be lost without it!

CREATE_NEW_CREATED.create_new_created_text: Your new QLC Chain Wallet has been created! Below is the mnemonic phrase and seed for your wallet, you can use whichever you prefer.
CREATE_NEW_CREATED.warning1: Make sure to write down your mnemonic phrase/seed or save it somewhere safe, and never share it with anyone!
CREATE_NEW_CREATED.warning2: It is the master key to all of your accounts, and the only way to recover your funds in an emergency.

SET_WALLET_PASSWORD.set_wallet_password_text: The last step is to set a new password for your wallet. Your password is used to encrypt the sensitive parts of your wallet when it is locked, which disables sending, receiving, creating accounts, and other operations.
SET_WALLET_PASSWORD.warning: If you lose your password, you can always restore your wallet using your seed.

WALLET_CONFIGURED.wallet_configured_text: Your wallet has been configured and you are ready to send and receive QLC Chain Tokens!
WALLET_CONFIGURED.warning: If you lose your password, you can always restore your wallet using your seed.
WALLET_CONFIGURED.warning_ledger: Press the Ledger status bar on the left side to reload your Ledger when connecting or disconnecting it.

IMPORT_ADDRESS_BOOK.error_text: There was an issue reading the import data for your address book.  Double check the address and try again.
IMPORT_ADDRESS_BOOK.label_exist: Labels already exist and will have their name changed.
IMPORT_ADDRESS_BOOK.label_modified: Labels already exist and will not be modified.
IMPORT_ADDRESS_BOOK.imported_text: Your address book has been successfully imported!

MANAGE_WALLET.export_wallet_text:
Use this export tool to simplify wallet transfer to other devices. Your data will be encrypted by your password, and then imported into NanoVault on your new device!

The export does not contain your address book.
MANAGE_WALLET.export_wallet_text2:
Scan the QR code on any device to load your QLC Chain wallet!

If you do not have a QR code scanner, you can also import your wallet by using the URL below.
MANAGE_WALLET.import_address_book_text: Use this option to import your address book from a file.
MANAGE_WALLET.backup_wallet_text1: To access backup options, unlock your wallet.
MANAGE_WALLET.backup_wallet_text2: To backup your wallet mnemonic phrase,
MANAGE_WALLET.backup_wallet_text3: to copy it to your clipboard.
MANAGE_WALLET.export_address_book_text1:
Use this tool to simplify transferring your address book between devices. Use the options below to export your address book from a file or QR Code/URL.

Your address book is not encrypted by your wallet password.
MANAGE_WALLET.export_address_book_text2:
Scan the QR code on any device to load your QLC Chain wallet!

If you do not have a QR code scanner, you can also import your wallet by using the URL below.
MANAGE_WALLET.export_address_book_copied: Address book export copied to clipboard!

NO_WALLET_CONFIGURED: You don't have a wallet configured,
NO_WALLET_CONFIGURED_CLICK: click here to create or import one
